mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, organization, phone, bio, role, created_at FROM users WHERE role != 'admin' ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, role, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{role}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, organization = #{organization}, phone = #{phone}, bio = #{bio} WHERE id = #{id}
